lead_paragraph: Lamer Owens, a former Navy quarterback acquitted of raping a female midshipman but convicted of two lesser charges should not face any punishment, a military jury recommended yesterday. On Thursday, Owens was found guilty of conduct unbecoming an officer and failure to obey an order issued to keep him away from his accuser.
